Variables
SharpNeat.​Neat.​Speciation.​GeneticKMeans
namespace SharpNeat.Neat.Speciation.GeneticKMeans
GeneticKMeansSpeciationStrategy
ISpeciationStrategy​<NeatGenome<T>, T>
public sealed
GeneticKMeansSpeciationStrategy​<T>
where T : struct

A speciation strategy that assigns genomes to species using k-means clustering on the genes of each genome.

This is the speciation scheme used in SharpNEAT 2.x.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net signal and weight data type.
